name: Google Calendar Material
description: A Material overhaul of the web version of the Google Calendar
additional_info:
v0.1 - First release:
 - Colored toolbar
 - Material buttons
 - Events are now cards
 - Cleaner monthly view
 - Cleaner weekly view
 - Calendar icon instead of the word 'Calendar'
 - Spinners (on the left side) now animate
 - Main color is now blue
 - Today indicators follow the main color

discussions.name: bug report: Compose button too high on half screen
